name: Powershell Trigger Profiles by Add_Content
description: Adversaries may gain persistence and elevate privileges by executing malicious content triggered by PowerShell profiles.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(powershell.file.script_block_text:*Add\-Content* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*$profile* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*\-Value* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:(*Start\-Process* OR *\"\"*))`
